Uses of Package
com.esri.mo2.file.shp

Packages that use com.esri.mo2.file.shp
com.esri.mo2.file.shp Support for accessing ESRI shapefiles. 
 

Classes in com.esri.mo2.file.shp used by com.esri.mo2.file.shp
DbfException
          This is the superclass of all dbf related exceptions.
DbfField
          This class is the superclass for all dBASE fields.
DbfFieldNameException
          This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an invalid name.
DbfFieldPrecisionException
          This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an incorrect precision.
DbfFieldWidthException
          This exception is thrown when a field has been defined with an incorrect width.
InvalidFeatureTypeException
          This Exception is thrown by the ShapefileReader class when it encounters a shapefile that it does not currently support.
InvalidSpatialIndexException
          This exception is thrown when the format of the Spatial index file is not correct.
InvalidVFileException
          This exception is thrown when the VFile class encounters a file whose type can not be determined.
MultiPartShape
          This class declares the methods that are common to all multipart Shapes.
MultiPartShapeM
          This class declares the methods that are common to all multipart Shapes with Measures.
MultiPartShapeZ
          This class declares the methods that are common to all multipart shapes with Z values.
MultiPointMShp
          This class handles MultiPointM shapes
MultiPointShp
          This class handles MultiPoint shapes
PointMShp
          This class handles PointM shapes
PointShp
          This class handles Point shape files
PolygonMShp
          This class processes PolygonM shapes
PolygonShp
          This class processes Polygon shapes
PolylineMShp
          This class processes PolylineM shapes
PolylineShp
          This class processes Polyline shapes
Shape
          This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes.
ShapefileIndex
          This interface establishes the methods that should be supported by all spatial indexes used with shapefiles.
ShapeM
          This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes with Measures.
ShapeZ
          This class declares the methods that are common to all non-multipart shapes with Z values.
ShpException
          This exception is thrown by the ShapefileWriter class whenever an attempt is made to write a feature to an incompatible shapefile type.
ShpGeometry
          This is the superclass for all shapefile geometry.
VFileRecord
          This class holds the contents of a VFILE record.
